name: .JCD File Extension
summary: Learn about .JCD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A JCD file is a 3D jewelry design created by JewelCAD, a computer-assisted jewelry design program. It contains a digital mock-up of a piece of jewelry. JCD files can be opened only in JewelCAD.

content: Jewelry designers can use JewelCAD to produce 3D prototypes of pieces of jewelry. These prototypes are saved in JCD files.

After a designer has finished creating a prototype, they can export their jewelry design as an .STL file. Jewelry machining and manufacturing facilities can use the STL file to turn the designer's prototype into a real piece of jewelry.

instructions: You can open a JCD file in JewelCAD (Windows). Additionally, you can use JewelCAD to export your JCD file as an STL file. To export a JCD file as an STL file, select Misc → Cut in Slices → Also Output STL file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
